n = 2, div = 1, ode = [-10*x0 + 10*x1, x0*(28 - x2) - x1, x0*x1 - 8*x2/3], t_end = 1/100
x2(1/100) = [1822807/1800000 - 11415905115405667*e/10191852318400884, 2237*e/2000 + 1013/1000]
          = [1.01267055555555555555555555556 - 1.12010111202208222438728429675*e, 1.1185*e + 1.013]
width = 11407745966768527877*e/5095926159200442000 + 593/1800000
      = 2.23860111202208222438728429675*e + 0.000329444444444444444444444444444
e_range_sup = 1077851513408/1971982604972815
            = 0.000546582667965703911383461549769
